          <title>
            <string language="hu">Johannes Vermeer: Alvó lány. 1657. New York, Metropolitan Museum of Art. 87,6 x 76,5 cm. Olaj, vászon.</string>
            <string language="en">Johannes Vermeer: Sleeping girl. 1657. New York, Metropolitan Museum of Art. 87,6 x 76,5 cm. Oil, canvas.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Johannes Vermeer: Schlafendes Mädchen. 
1657. New York, Metropolitanmuseum der kunst. 87.6 x
76.5 Zentimeter. Öl, Segeltuch.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Johannes Vermeer : Fille de sommeil. 
1657. New York, musée métropolitain d'art. 87.6 x 
76.5 centimètres. Huile, toile.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Johannes Vermeer: Menina dormindo. 
1657. New York, museu metropolitano da arte. 87.6 x 
76.5 cm. Óleo, lona.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Johannes Vermeer: Ragazza addormentata. 
1657. New York, museo metropolitano di arte. 87.6 x 
76.5 centimetri. Olio, tela di canapa.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Ιοχαννες Vermeer: Κορίτσι ύπνου. 1657. Νέα Υόρκη, μητροπολιτικό μουσείο των εκατ. πετρελαίου 
αρθ. 87.6 X 76.5, καμβάς.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Johannes Vermeer: Muchacha durmiente. 
1657. Nueva York, museo metropolitana del arte. 87.6
x 76.5 centímetros. Aceite, lona.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Asztalra támaszkodó, szendergő lény</string>
            <string language="en">A girl leaning and slumbering on a table </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">17. század,   festészet,   életkép,   Hollandia,   Vermeer,  </string>
            <string language="en">17th century, painting, anecdotal picture, the Netherlands, Vermeer</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Mädchen, das auf einer Tabelle sich lehnt und 
slumbering</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une fille se penchant et slumbering sur une table</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma menina que inclina-se e que slumbering em uma tabela</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una ragazza che si appoggia e che slumbering su una 
tabella</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα κορίτσι που κλίνει και που κοιμάται σε έναν 
πίνακα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una muchacha que se inclina y slumbering en un vector</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">17. Jahrhundert, Anstrich, anekdotische Abbildung, die 
Niederlande, Vermeer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">17ème siècle, peinture, image anecdotique, les 
Pays Bas, Vermeer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">17o século, pintura, retrato anecdotal, os Países 
Baixos, Vermeer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">diciassettesimo secolo, pittura, immagine anecdotal, 
Paesi Bassi, Vermeer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">17$ος αιώνας, ζωγραφική, ανεκδοτική εικόνα, οι Κάτω Χώρες,
Vermeer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">17mo siglo, pintura, cuadro anecdótico, los Países 
Bajos, Vermeer</string>
          </keyword>
